All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BikeTableModel
Represents a table model for displaying a list of ElectricBike objects in a JTable.
BikeTableModelForDeserialization
Represents a table model for displaying deserialized list of ElectricBike objects in a JTable.
Bill
Represents a bill for a vehicle rental.
CarTableModel
Represents a table model for displaying a list of ElectricCars objects in a JTable.
CarTableModelForDeserialization
Represents a table model for displaying deserialized list of ElectricCar objects in a JTable.
Driver
Represents a driver with personal identification details and license information.
ElectricBike
The ElectricBike class represents an electric bike, which is a type of vehicle.
ElectricCar
The ElectricCar class represents an electric car, which is a type of vehicle.
ElectricScooter
The ElectricScooter class represents an electric scooter, which is a type of vehicle.
Epj2SimulationGui
The main GUI class for the EPJ2 simulation application.
MainFrame
Represents the main frame of the simulation application.
Malfunction
Represents a malfunction of a vehicle, including its description and occurrence date and time.
MalfunctionTableModel
Represents a table model for displaying rental objects with malfunction in a JTable.
MatrixPanel
A JPanel subclass that displays a matrix grid where each cell can hold multiple IDs.
ReadRentals
Handles the reading and processing of rental data from a file.
ReadVehicles
This class is responsible for reading vehicle data from a CSV file and loading them into a set of Vehicle objects.
Rental
Represents a rental transaction, extending 'Thread' to allow simulation of vehicle movement.
RentalCalculator
The RentalCalculator class provides functionality for calculating and managing rental prices.
Report
Represents a report generated from rental bills, including methods for calculating various matrics.
ScooterTableModel
Represents a table model for displaying a list of ElectricScooters objects in a JTable.
ScooterTableModelForDeserialization
Represents a table model for displaying deserialized list of ElectricScooter objects in a JTable.
ShowDailyReportFrame
A JFrame that displays a daily report of various financial metrics.
ShowDeserializedVehiclesFrame
A JFrame that displays deserialized damaged vehicles, electric cars, bikes, and scooters.
ShowMalfunctionsFrame
A JFrame that displays a table of rentals with associated malfunctions.
ShowSummaryReportFrame
A JFrame that displays a summary report of various financial metrics.
ShowVehiclesFrame
A JFrame that displays a set of vehicles categorized into electric cars, bikes, and scooters.
Vehicle
Abstract class representing a vehicle.
VehicleSerialization
The VehicleSerialization class provides methods for serializing and deserializing Vehicle objects.
